metadata.title: CVE-2023-0797 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds read in tiffcrop inlibtiff/tif_unix.c:368, invoked by tools/tiffcrop.c:2903 andtools/tiffcrop.c:6921, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service viaa crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fixis available with commit afaabc3e.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10').
